author: henning
msg: Make the loading of the properties file from the class loader a bit more
robust. Allow passing "null" into the C'tor, thus directly accessing the
classpath and bypassing the check for a defined class.
Wrap getting the class loader into a security check. I lifted this code
straight from commons-logging, so credits apply here. :-)

author: ebourg
msg: Fixed bug 29722 (addProperty throws a NPE in DOMConfiguration)

author: ebourg
msg: Better test coverage (addProperty on non initialiazed configurations and attribute properties tests)

author: ebourg
msg: Now use the "line.separator" system property to make the test plateform independent.
